Core.Line: I feel so stiff... And heavy... Where am I?
Should I be here?
This place is so hollow and peaceful. My mind and voice seem to melt together.
This is Nowhere. You are at the Middle of Nowhere.
Are you talking to me?
I don't see anyone else besides us. So yes, I'm talking to you, Island.
(So my name is Island. And... I can speak.)
I don't know. It feels strange. Every part of me feels strange.
If you feel strange, maybe it's a sign that you shouldn't be here.
You are not answering the question.
Who knows? For me, I feel normal to be here. Just normal.
Fine. So why are you here? Are you helping me or just a random passerby?
Calm down. I'm here to deliver a message: You need to go to Mount Uphill. There are all the answers.
... I apologise.
It's alright.
Can I trust you?
Do you have a choice?
Island keeps his mouth shut and Queen can feel he is all tensed up.
You do. You always do. Please don't forget.
(Sigh.) I guess I'd better get going. May I have your name before I leave?
Queen. Queen is my name.
Queen of Nowhere?
Just Queen. That title is ... a bit ridiculous, isn't it?
Warmth and nostalgia ripples in Island's body.
Two more things. Don't take anything for granted. And stay safe.
I will keep that in mind.
